name: Super Jank Kenny Asset Racer
description:
Think you have what it takes to be a pirate? Sail through seas, land, rock, and pavement in this super jank and tough to control boat racer made using only Kenny-created assets. See if you can make your way to the end of the course and post your times in the comments!

Use WASD/Arrow Keys to control, X to brake, and R to restart (just in case you flip over :^) ) 

Created for Kenny Jam 2019, with the theme Unlikely Combinations. What's more unlikely than a boat speeding through a race course? 

Assets used: too many to count.
